name: __EQuartzCommandType
doc: An enumeration for specifying Quartz command types

PlaySound: Play a sound on a spample-accurate boundary (taking a voice slot immediately)
QueueSoundToPlay: Queue a sound to play when it gets closer to its quantization boundary (avoids stealing a voice slot right away)
RetriggerSound: Quantized looping of the target sound (event tells the AudioComponent to play the sound again)
TickRateChange: Quantized change of the tick-rate (i.e. BPM change)
TransportReset: Quantized reset of the clocks transport (back to time = 0 on the boundary)
StartOtherClock: Quantized start of another clock. Useful for sample accurate synchronization of clocks (i.e. to handle time signature changes)
Notify: Command used only to get delegates for timing information (basically an empty command)
